title: Federal Student Loan Simulator - Repayment Strategy - User Data
description: User data required to execute Federal Student Loan Simulator repayment strategy wizard

has_job.description: Whether the borrower has a job or plans to get one soon

filed_taxes.description: Whether the borrower filed taxes in the last two years

marital_status_married.description: Whether the borrower is married or will be soon

has_dependents.description: Whether the borrower has children or other dependents

retirement_savings_taxable.description: Whether the borrower saves for retirement but will pay tax on it later

additional_taxable_income.description: Whether the borrower has additional taxable income

health_insurance_paycheck.description: Whether the borrower pays or will pay health insurance premiums through their paycheck

health_savings_account.description: Whether the borrower contributes to a health savings account or flexible spending account

none_apply.description: Whether none of the personal information options apply to the borrower (mutually exclusive with other checkboxes)

current_loans.description: List of current student loans the borrower has

loan_interest_rate.description: Annual interest rate as a percentage (e.g., 5.5 for 5.5%)

pslf_interest.description: Whether the borrower wants to see repayment options for Public Service Loan Forgiveness eligibility

primary_repayment_goal.description: The borrower's primary goal for loan repayment
